title: The Dark Lord Advances (3C87)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. That player must discard X cards from hand, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'A power was there that we have not felt before.'”
Rarity:	C
